summary: A suite of video effect utilities that extend MoviePy clips with visual transformations, color adjustments, temporal modifications, and compositing helpers, allowing developers to programmatically alter frame content, timing, and appearance.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use library of reusable effects so that video editors and developers can quickly enhance, stylize, and animate video clips without writing low‑level pixel processing code, supporting automated video production pipelines and creative applications.
